item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 12, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: iFixit created a new USB-C, repairable soldering system (160 points | 52 comments)
2. GAZEploit: Remote keystroke inference attack by gaze estimation in VR/MR devices (96 points | 56 comments)
3. If I could dissect a sauropod (54 points | 3 comments)
4. Kolmogorov-Arnold networks may make neural networks more understandable (154 points | 45 comments)
5. Can LLMs Generate Novel Research Ideas? (7 points | 1 comment)
6. Why Haskell? (199 points | 274 comments)
7. Ergo: Erlang-inspired event driven actor framework in Go (71 points | 30 comments)
8. Peer Gynt quilt, Part 1 (2021) (35 points | 3 comments)
9. Show HN: Goroutine Monitor Powered by eBPF (23 points | discuss)
10. Show HN: Repogather – copy relevant files to clipboard for LLM coding workflows (19 points | 12 comments)
11. Linear, symmetric, self-selecting 14-bit molecular memristors (2023) (81 points | 45 comments)
12. DEF Con 32 – AMD Sinkclose Universal Ring-2 Privilege Escalation (Not Redacted) [pdf] (147 points | 12 comments)
13. Qubit Transistors Reach Error Correction Benchmark (36 points | 5 comments)
14. Exponential Rate Limiting (54 points | 7 comments)
15. Show HN: Konty – A Balsamiq-alternative lo-fi wireframe tool for modern apps (300 points | 107 comments)
16. Large-Scale Generation of Transit Maps from OpenStreetMap Data (205 points | 23 comments)
17. Old Easter Island genomes show no sign of a population collapse (60 points | 16 comments)
18. Ask HN: Should I put my startup on my resume? (11 points | 17 comments)
19. The new EVE MMO uses blockchain tech to create a "boiling financial hellscape" (13 points | 18 comments)
20. Critical Resources and the First 14 KB (2022) (39 points | 5 comments)
21. A MiniGolf game for Palm OS (295 points | 92 comments)
22. Be a thermostat, not a thermometer (2023) (226 points | 107 comments)
23. Why Oxide Chose Illumos (155 points | 90 comments)
24. We spent $20 to achieve RCE and accidentally became the admins of .mobi (1463 points | 334 comments)
25. Java – Integrity by Default (JVMLS 2024) (44 points | 16 comments)
26. Reader-LM: Small Language Models for Cleaning and Converting HTML to Markdown (160 points | 33 comments)
27. Show HN: Build Your WSL Distro in Docker (24 points | 4 comments)
28. AppleWatchAmmeter (312 points | 64 comments)
29. Wild Mustang and Burro Freeze Marks (2020) [pdf] (21 points | 11 comments)
30. Breast milk's benefits are not limited to babies (7 points | 3 comments)
